paper_abstract: This paper presents a new Memetic Algorithm designed to compute near optimal solutions for the MinLA problem. It incorporates a highly specialized crossover operator, a fast MinLA heuristic used to create the initial population and a local search operator based on a fine tuned Simulated Annealing algorithm. Its performance is investigated through extensive experimentation over well known benchmarks and compared with other state-of-the-art algorithms.
paper_title: Memetic algorithms for the MinLA problem
